about_the_game:
This pack covers characters and creatures found in a supernatural wild west setting.

This token pack includes:
  • Bone Horror
  • Desert Squid
  • Desert Thing
  • Devil Bat
  • Diabull
  • Dust Judge
  • Female Adventurer
  • 2 Female Gunslingers
  • Female Gunslinger with hat
  • Female Indian
  • Ghost Miner
  • Male Gunslinger
  • Male Gunslinger no hat
  • 2 Male Hucksters
  • 2 Male Indian Braves
  • Male Indian Shaman
  • Male Mad Scientist
  • Male Preacher
  • Night Scarer
  • Steampunk Robot Sheriff
  • 2 Vulture Scavengers
  • Wall Clinger
  • Wendigo

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
